title: The touchscreen is slow or unresponsive when charging
answer:
This is normal for phones with capacitive screens. This is because the touchscreen function relies on an electric current. The current is unstable when charging and this can sometimes cause the touchscreen to become unresponsive or move. 

 Please use the charger and data cable included to charge the phone. In addition, avoid using the phone when charging.
keywords: charge, touchscreen, screen, slow response, delayed response, touchscreen lag, unresponsive
